description:
Very nice and unexpected fall near Antrim.  Nothing really around here to indicate a fall but using my waterfall instinct (lol), I was able to find a 20 ft drop (total height combination).  Right now the brooks are dry but it would look very good at high flow.  

from a well maintained dirt Rd (Antrim Rd),hike along an ATV/ logging road until a secondary path on your right goes down a significant hill.  at the bottom is the brook and fall immediately downstream.  It is set in a pretty good looking mature evergreen stand.
directions: Antrim Rd to the ATV path located at; N44° 58' 05.2" W63° 22' 38.7" (to the north of MacMullin Rd)
title: Ruggs Brook Fall
